thread.title: Bernadette
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Bernadette

author: Bernadette
title: Bernadette
text: Bought Barbour jacket x2 due to not knowing which size to get. Returned one of them & refund followed straight away. Excellent delivery & return service,don't hesitate if in doubt .
